requirements.name: User Authentication
requirements.description: The system must provide secure user authentication for mortgage loan applications when users have valid credentials.

requirements.name: Credit Score Validation
requirements.description: If credit score is above 650, then automatically approve the preliminary assessment for mortgage applications.

requirements.name: Interest Rate Calculation
requirements.description: The interest rate must be calculated as the base rate plus risk premium, where risk premium is determined by credit score and loan amount.

requirements.name: System Performance
requirements.description: The system shall process mortgage applications within 5 seconds for 95% of requests under normal load conditions.

requirements.name: Document Upload
requirements.description: Users must be able to upload financial documents in PDF format with maximum size of 10MB per document.

requirements.name: Loan Amount Constraints
requirements.description: When loan amount exceeds $500,000, additional documentation and manager approval are required before processing.

requirements.name: Data Encryption
requirements.description: All customer financial data must be encrypted at rest and in transit using AES-256 encryption standards.

requirements.name: Interdiction Check
requirements.description: The system must verify that applicants are not on financial interdiction lists before approving any loan applications.

requirements.name: Audit Trail
requirements.description: The system shall maintain a complete audit trail of all changes to loan applications for regulatory compliance.

requirements.name: Mobile Compatibility
requirements.description: The application interface must be responsive and functional on mobile devices with screen sizes from 320px to 768px width.
